song_lyrics: Guru bin kaun batāve bāṭ? Baḍā vikaṭ yamghāṭ...
Bhrānti kī pahāḍī nadiyā bichme ahamkār kī lāṭ... 1
Kām krodh do parvat ṭhāḍe lobh chor sanghāt... 2
Mad matsarkā meh barsat māyā pavan bahe dāṭ... 3
Kahat Kabīr suno bhāī sādho, kyo tarnā yah ghāṭ... 4
title: Guru bin kaun batāve bāṭ?

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-290: Kabirdas

Category: Anya Hindi Pad
